item.title: Best local bars? 11 unique spots worth a road trip in Florida
item.description: Thebest barsin Florida aren’t just for grabbing a drink — they’re for creating memories, and maybe a story you shouldn’t share at work on Monday.

item.title: Jen Pawol umpired spring training game in West Palm Beach, set for MLB history
item.description: Jen Pawol will become the first woman to umpire a Major League Baseball regular-season game when she works three games during the August 8-10 series between theMiami MarlinsandBravesat Atlanta's Truist Park.

item.title: POLL: Vote for best Sarasota, Manatee high school football game for 2025 season
item.description: There are plenty of quality games on the high school football slates this year in Manatee and Sarasota counties. Area teams are opting for out-of-area, and in some cases, out-of-state opponents when filling out their regular-season schedule. Even some of the fall classics have teams travelling up to 3 hours for a game that does not count toward their record for a chance to beef up their slates.

item.title: Manatee County plans a new curfew for minors
item.description: Manatee County willimpose a new curfew on minorsmeant to keep kids safe during overnight hours, despite strong criticism of potential pitfalls from County Commission Chairman George Kruse.

item.title: Football Recruiting 2026: Florida high school summer…
Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high…
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: Sarasota deputies arrest woman for arson, homicide after trailer fire
item.description: Sarasota County Sheriff’s Office deputieshave arrested a woman for homicide and first-degree arsonfollowing a Nokomis camper trailer fire that killed one person on August 5.

item.title: 'The Muffin Man:' Sarasota WWII vet spreads cheer as he turns 100
item.description: Alvin “Al” Seidman joined the U.S. Coast Guard after graduating high school in 1944 because a friend told him that boot camp was in nearby Manhattan Beach, just a subway ride away from his East New York home in Brooklyn.
